title: Asbex
author: ''
date: '2022-09-08'
slug: asbex
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $4.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Asbex. The average
  contract duration was 0.68 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $241.5K. The longest
  contract was 3.48 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $6.7M.
lookup_name: 'ASBEX'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '4.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '83'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '19'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '23%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '26%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.58'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.68'
s421_mean_contract_value: '241.5K'
s425_max_duration: '3.48'
s422_max_contract_value: '6.7M'
---
